pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: Despite what `downsample_add` may have done, in general do not reuse variables names when they represent different things. This is no longer the `inarray` and it is definitely no longer a flat array. Your example seems to have taken an array and produced a matrix (or a list of a list). Something more descriptive would help.
content.html: Despite what downsample_add may have done, in general do not reuse variables names when they represent different things. This is no longer the inarray and it is definitely no longer a flat array. Your example seems to have taken an array and produced a matrix (or a list of a list). Something more descriptive would help.
